languages.text: {n}Так подумал бы любой несведущий в ремесле {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}контрабанды{/d}. Прятать запрещенку по тайникам без присмотра — недальновидно. Везучий проходимец или законник может случайно найти товар, но такой в меру отвратительный и жалкий старикан послужил бы отличным пугалом.{/n}

{n}Or rather, that is what someone with no experience in the art of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}smuggling{/d} would think if they were in your place. Hiding contraband in caches without leaving a watcher is a short-sighted gamble, as there is always a chance that some lucky scoundrel or patrolman might stumble upon the goods. Someone suitably repulsive and miserable, like this old man, often acts as the perfect deterrent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Так подумал бы любой несведущий в ремесле {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}контрабанды{/d}. Прятать запрещенку по тайникам без присмотра — недальновидно. Hiding contraband in caches without leaving a watcher is a short-sighted gamble, as there is always a chance that some lucky scoundrel or patrolman might stumble upon the goods. Someone suitably repulsive and miserable, like this old man, often acts as the perfect deterrent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jedenfalls würde das jemand, der keine Erfahrung in der Kunst des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Schmuggelns{/d} hat an deiner Stelle denken. Schmuggelgut unbewacht zu lagern, ist ausgesprochen riskant, weil jederzeit irgendein Glückspilz oder eine Patrouille über die Ware stolpern kann. Jemand, der so abstoßend und armselig ist wie dieser alte Mann ist oft eine perfekte Tarnung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Or rather, that is what someone with no experience in the art of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}smuggling{/d} would think if they were in your place. Hiding contraband in caches without leaving a watcher is a short-sighted gamble, as there is always a chance that some lucky scoundrel or patrolman might stumble upon the goods. Someone suitably repulsive and miserable, like this old man, often acts as the perfect deterrent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jedenfalls würde das jemand, der keine Erfahrung in der Kunst des {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Schmuggelns{/d} hat an deiner Stelle denken. Schmuggelgut unbewacht zu lagern, ist ausgesprochen riskant, weil jederzeit irgendein Glückspilz oder eine Patrouille über die Ware stolpern kann. Jemand, der so abstoßend und armselig ist wie dieser alte Mann ist oft eine perfekte Tarnung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ou plutôt, c'est ce que penserait quelqu'un d'inexpérimenté dans l'art de la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}contrebande{/d} s'il était à votre place. Cacher des marchandises illicites et les laisser sans surveillance est un pari très risqué, car on ne peut exclure le risque qu'une canaille chanceuse ou qu'un patrouilleur tombe dessus. Un individu aussi répugnant et misérable que ce vieillard constitue souvent un repoussoir parfait.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Or rather, that is what someone with no experience in the art of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}smuggling{/d} would think if they were in your place. Hiding contraband in caches without leaving a watcher is a short-sighted gamble, as there is always a chance that some lucky scoundrel or patrolman might stumble upon the goods. Someone suitably repulsive and miserable, like this old man, often acts as the perfect deterrent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ou plutôt, c'est ce que penserait quelqu'un d'inexpérimenté dans l'art de la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}contrebande{/d} s'il était à votre place. Cacher des marchandises illicites et les laisser sans surveillance est un pari très risqué, car on ne peut exclure le risque qu'une canaille chanceuse ou qu'un patrouilleur tombe dessus. Un individu aussi répugnant et misérable que ce vieillard constitue souvent un repoussoir parfait.{/n}

languages.text: {n}O, al menos, eso pensaría alguien que no entienda de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}contrabando{/d} en tu lugar. Ocultar la mercancía sin dejar a nadie vigilando demuestra estrechez de miras, porque siempre hay algún vagabundo o guardia fisgón que encuentra el producto. Alguien lo bastante asqueroso y miserable como este anciano es un agente disuasor perfecto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Or rather, that is what someone with no experience in the art of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}smuggling{/d} would think if they were in your place. Hiding contraband in caches without leaving a watcher is a short-sighted gamble, as there is always a chance that some lucky scoundrel or patrolman might stumble upon the goods. Someone suitably repulsive and miserable, like this old man, often acts as the perfect deterrent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}O, al menos, eso pensaría alguien que no entienda de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}contrabando{/d} en tu lugar. Ocultar la mercancía sin dejar a nadie vigilando demuestra estrechez de miras, porque siempre hay algún vagabundo o guardia fisgón que encuentra el producto. Alguien lo bastante asqueroso y miserable como este anciano es un agente disuasor perfecto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}いや、むしろ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}密輸{/d}の経験のない者があなたの立場にいればそう思ったことだろう。見張りなしで隠し場所に密輸品を隠すのは、短絡的なギャンブルである。運のいい悪党やパトロール隊員が品物に出くわす可能性はいつだってある。この老人のように、適度に嫌悪感を抱かせる惨めな人物は、しばしば完璧な抑止力として機能する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Or rather, that is what someone with no experience in the art of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}smuggling{/d} would think if they were in your place. Hiding contraband in caches without leaving a watcher is a short-sighted gamble, as there is always a chance that some lucky scoundrel or patrolman might stumble upon the goods. Someone suitably repulsive and miserable, like this old man, often acts as the perfect deterrent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}いや、むしろ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}密輸{/d}の経験のない者があなたの立場にいればそう思ったことだろう。見張りなしで隠し場所に密輸品を隠すのは、短絡的なギャンブルである。運のいい悪党やパトロール隊員が品物に出くわす可能性はいつだってある。この老人のように、適度に嫌悪感を抱かせる惨めな人物は、しばしば完璧な抑止力として機能する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}更确切地说，如果换做是一个没有任何{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}走私{/d}经验的人，这个人很可能就会这么想。若是藏好了违禁品，但却不留下任何人来看管，那恐怕就太冒险了，毕竟总是会有某些运气好的混蛋，或是偶然路过的巡逻人员意外发现被藏起来的东西。这种时候，如果能安排个身世悲惨、令人厌恶的家伙，比如像这个老人一样的人，往往能有效地赶走那些家伙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Or rather, that is what someone with no experience in the art of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}smuggling{/d} would think if they were in your place. Hiding contraband in caches without leaving a watcher is a short-sighted gamble, as there is always a chance that some lucky scoundrel or patrolman might stumble upon the goods. Someone suitably repulsive and miserable, like this old man, often acts as the perfect deterrent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}更确切地说，如果换做是一个没有任何{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}走私{/d}经验的人，这个人很可能就会这么想。若是藏好了违禁品，但却不留下任何人来看管，那恐怕就太冒险了，毕竟总是会有某些运气好的混蛋，或是偶然路过的巡逻人员意外发现被藏起来的东西。这种时候，如果能安排个身世悲惨、令人厌恶的家伙，比如像这个老人一样的人，往往能有效地赶走那些家伙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Daha doğrusu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}kaçakçılık{/d} sanatında hiçbir tecrübesi olmayan birisinin senin yerinde olması hâlinde düşünebileceği bir şey bu. Gözcü bırakmadan kaçak malları kasalarda saklamak, dar görüşlülükle kumar oynamak olur. Çünkü şanslı bir düzenbaz ya da devriyenin mallara denk gelmesi ihtimali her zaman vardır. Tıpkı bu ihtiyar adam gibi gerektiği şekilde tiksindirici ve perişan görünen birisi, sıklıkla mükemmel bir caydırıcı rolünü üstlenir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Or rather, that is what someone with no experience in the art of {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}smuggling{/d} would think if they were in your place. Hiding contraband in caches without leaving a watcher is a short-sighted gamble, as there is always a chance that some lucky scoundrel or patrolman might stumble upon the goods. Someone suitably repulsive and miserable, like this old man, often acts as the perfect deterrent.{/n}
